eventName: Code and Connect 3.0 - SheBuilds Chennai Meetup
eventDescription: Join Tamilnadu's largest women-in-tech conference, let's learn, network and grow together!

This full-day event is designed to immerse you in the latest AI trends, hands-on workshops, and insightful tech sessions led by industry experts. With interactive discussions, real-world applications, and networking opportunities, this is your chance to learn, connect, and innovate with fellow AI enthusiasts.

eventName: [Workshop] Beyond ELK: Elastic Stack in Practice
eventDescription: This session explores real-world Elastic Stack usage, from core ELK fundamentals to production-ready architectures, covering scaling strategies, performance tuning, and best practices for teams running Elastic at scale.

eventName: AI in Action: Prompting to Fine Tuning LLMs - A Hands-on Workshop
eventDescription: This is a deep technical, hands-on session designed for developers who want to actively build and experiment with AI models during the workshop. Participants will engage in live coding and fine-tuning exercises using open-source LLMs. The session focuses on practical application, from prompt engineering to retrieval augmentation and lightweight fine-tuning.
